translations: v.使平静，安抚；减轻，缓和（疼痛）

phrs.translation: 安慰, 安抚, 索析, 恤问
我不会安抚你的疼痛, 我不会减轻你的痛苦, 我不能为你治疗伤痛
安抚燃烧的火焰, 抚平创伤, 安慰那燃烧
安慰, 使平静, 镇定

sentences.sentence: It uses therapy animals to soothe nervous passengers.
sentences.translation: 它使用治疗动物来安抚紧张的乘客。

sentences.sentence: He became as wild as a beast and no one could soothe him.
sentences.translation: 他变得像野兽一样狂野，没有人能抚慰他。

sentences.sentence: Many people soothe their consciences by purchasing only free-range fowl and eggs, blissfully ignorant that "free range" has very little practical significance.
sentences.translation: 许多人只买自由放养的家禽和鸡蛋，以此来安抚自己的良心，幸福地忽视了“自由放养”几乎没有实际意义。
